com.github.dexecutor.core.graph

Interface DependencyAware<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of Node/Task ID
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Dag<T,R>, Dexecutor<T,R>, DexecutorState<T,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDag, DefaultDexecutor, DefaultDexecutorState

    public interface DependencyAware<T>
    Implementors should be aware of the the dependencies between entities
    Author:
    Nadeem Mohammad

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAsDependencyToAllInitialNodes(T nodeValue)
      Adds the node as dependency to all initial nodes (at the time of adding), meaning this given node would be evaluated first and then all initial nodes would run in parallel
      void addAsDependentOnAllLeafNodes(T nodeValue)
      Adds the node as dependent on all leaf nodes (at the time of adding), meaning all leaf nodes would be evaluated first and then the given node
      void addDependency(T evalFirstValue, T evalAfterValue)
      Should add the two nodes in the datastructure in such a way that evalFirstValue should be evaluated before evalAfterValue.
      void addIndependent(T nodeValue)
      Adds the given node to the datastructure whith out any dependency Nodes should be created only if it is not already added.

    • Method Detail

      • addIndependent

        void addIndependent(T nodeValue)
        Adds the given node to the datastructure whith out any dependency Nodes should be created only if it is not already added.
        Parameters:
        nodeValue - Unique node id

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(T evalFirstValue,
                   T evalAfterValue)
        Should add the two nodes in the datastructure in such a way that evalFirstValue should be evaluated before evalAfterValue. Nodes should be created only if it is not already added.
        Parameters:
        evalFirstValue - Node which should be evaluated first
        evalAfterValue - Node which should be evaluated after evalFirstValue

      • addAsDependentOnAllLeafNodes

        void addAsDependentOnAllLeafNodes(T nodeValue)
        Adds the node as dependent on all leaf nodes (at the time of adding), meaning all leaf nodes would be evaluated first and then the given node
        Parameters:
        nodeValue - Node which should depend on all leaf nodes

      • addAsDependencyToAllInitialNodes

        void addAsDependencyToAllInitialNodes(T nodeValue)
        Adds the node as dependency to all initial nodes (at the time of adding), meaning this given node would be evaluated first and then all initial nodes would run in parallel
        Parameters:
        nodeValue - Node on which all initial nodes should depends on
